nodes.name: forgiveDebt

params._salt: ID of debt between creditor and debtor
params._settlementPeriod: Time in seconds after that creditor can claim to return debt

params._id: ID of debt in debt mapping

params.clearingHouse: Address of contract that available to clear debts.
params.retiringPeriod: How many time Holding resides in Retire state since retire() method called.

params._token: Currency of deposit - token address or 0x0 for ETH

params._id: ID of debt in debt mapping

params._signature: Signature of contract owner (debtor) of withdrawDigest
params._token: Currency of withdraw - address for token, 0x0 for ETH

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Add deposit with value _amount in currency _token

forgiveDebt(bytes32,bytes).notice: Forgive a debt. Can be called by creditor.

retire(bytes).notice: Prepare contract for termination. Starts a retiring period. After retiring period no new debts could be added. One could only repay the existing debts.

stop().notice: Prepare contract for termination. Starts a retiring period.
